channel.title: Tessa Thompson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Daniel Day-Lewis, Richard Linklater and Yorgos Lanthimos Set for Talks at BFI London Film Festival
item.description: Celebrated filmmakers Jafar Panahi, Lynne Ramsay and Chloé Zhao will also join for sessions at this year’s edition of Screen Talks in the British capital.

item.title: Daniel Day-Lewis, Richard Linklater and Yorgos Lanthimos Set for Talks at BFI London Film Festival
item.description: Celebrated filmmakers Jafar Panahi, Lynne Ramsay and Chloé Zhao will also join for sessions at this year’s edition of Screen Talks in the British capital.

item.title: Saoirse Ronan’s ‘Bad Apples,’ Tessa Thompson’s ‘Hedda’ and Amanda Seyfried’s ‘Testament of Ann Lee’ Among BFI London Film Festival Competition Titles
item.description: The 69th BFI London Film Festival has unveiled its competition lineup, featuring Oscar nominee Saoirse Ronan and Tessa Thompson in a diverse slate of 10 films competing for the fest’s best film

item.title: ‘The Smashing Machine,’ ‘Hedda,’ ‘The Lost Bus’ Among Zurich Gala Premieres
item.description: Rebecca Zlotowski’s ‘A Private Life’ with Jodie Foster, and Haifaa Al Mansour’s ‘Unidentified’ will also get the gala treatment at the 21st Zurich Festival.

item.title: ‘The Smashing Machine,’ ‘Hedda,’ ‘The Lost Bus’ Among Zurich Gala Premieres
item.description: Rebecca Zlotowski’s ‘A Private Life’ with Jodie Foster, and Haifaa Al Mansour’s ‘Unidentified’ will also get the gala treatment at the 21st Zurich Festival.
